name: INParameter
desc: A parameter of an interaction object.

items.name: init(for: AnyClass, keyPath: String)
items.desc: Creates a new parameter object using the specified key path and class information.

items.name: init?<Root, Value>(keyPath: KeyPath<Root, Value>)
items.desc: Creates a new parameter object using the specified key path and class information.

items.name: var parameterKeyPath: String
items.desc: The key path to a property of an interaction object.

items.name: var parameterClass: AnyClass
items.desc: The type of object represented by this parameter.

items.name: func index(forSubKeyPath: String) -> Int
items.desc: The index into the array at the specified portion of the key path.

items.name: func setIndex(Int, forSubKeyPath: String)
items.desc: Specifies which item of an array or ordered set to use for the parameter.

items.name: func isEqual(to: INParameter) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified parameter object represents the same property as the current parameter object.
